document_data.name: Turn bin Trevor
document_data.mainbody: '''Turn bin Trevor''', formerly known as '''Turon Daysender''' was a male [[human]] [[fighter]] from [[Waterdeep]] who came to [[Zakhara]]. He was [[Jayani al-Jasir]]'s consort as of [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Turn was a handsome young outlander in [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Relationships: Turn gained the attentions and affections of Jayani al-Jasir and enjoyed life as her romantic consort.
document_data.History:
Turn was originally from [[Waterdeep]] where he was called Turon Daysender.

Turn sailed all across the coastlines of the [[Realms]], eventually settling in the [[Corsair Domains]] of Zakhara. Jayani planned to use him to help extend her holdings beyond the [[Land of Fate]].
